get_mark_tab

Source: R/get_mark_tab.R
get_mark_tab.Rd

Gives a table of marks

Usage

get_mark_tab(augmented_mark_obj, course_id, term, year)

Arguments

augmented_mark_obj

augmented-mark-obj

course_id

course-id

term

term

year

year of offering

Value

DT-obj

Examples

get_mark_tab(augmented_example_marks, course_id = "STATS-3001", term = "Sem 1", 2016)
